description: A pact to uphold truth. The false slung broken upon their lies.

ability.name: Punitive Stroke
ability.description: Make a melee attack against a known liar. Get +d10 to the attack, ignoring armour.

passion.name: Honesty
passion.description: Restore SPI when you tell the truth where a lie might be more beneficial.

data.text: Lying to you about their identity
Lying to you about their intent.

items.name: kite shield
items.description: Marked with a symbol of the truth

description: Immersed within the woods. A sheriff of natural order

ability.name: Wild Eye
ability.description: Observe a beast in secret. Learn a useful truth about their habitat.

passion.name: Empathy
passion.description: Restore SPI when you spare the life of a hostile animal.

items.name: Handaxe attached to Wildrope
items.description: Attached to Wildrope. (strong rope that blends perfectly into foliage),

description: A calling brought a life of combat. Nay a protector, in fact a competitor.

ability.name: Champion Vow
ability.description: Use immediately before a combat where there is a prize at stake. +d6 to melee attacks for the whole combat.

passion.name: Hatred
passion.description: Restore SPI when you refuse a plea for forgiveness.

items.name: Greatlance
items.description: Hefty when mounted, slow on foot

description: Some were born to fight. This one birthed from the very blood of battle.

ability.name: Bloody Echo
ability.description: Use immediately after defeating an opponent. Your next melee attack in this combat gains Blast.

passion.name: Justice
passion.description: Restore SPI when you restore the balance of justice.

items.name: Brutal plate
items.description: A1 only when Wounded

items.name: Sacks of very strong alcohol, to which you're largely resistant

description: The tree and stone had no need to be taught. The wisest knew to study beneath them.

ability.name: Mosstongue
ability.description: Speak with uncut stones and particularly old trees. If you push them for too much knowledge they rebuke you, shunning you for the rest of the day.

passion.name: Naturality
passion.description: Restore SPI when you reject an opportunity to sleep indoors, sleeping in nature instead.

description: Forged and broken in the bloodied mud. Won some, lost some, ever survived.

ability.name: Battle Awareness
ability.description: When fighting in a combat with at least 3 combatants on each side all your Gambits count as Strong Gambits.

passion.name: Duty
passion.description: Restore SPI when you answer the call for martial service under a superior.

description: The giants fought the storm, falling, all broken bones. The youth, thrown about, arose in the calm.

ability.name: Bend with the Wind
ability.description: When you use a Gambit to Move you count as having Armour 4 until your next turn. This does not stack with your actual armour.

passion.name: Doubt
passion.description: Restore SPI when you defer to somebody more senior than you, even though you disagree.

items.name: Youthful Energy
items.description: Use once only to treat a Mortal Wound as a normal wound)

description: A beacon of the brave and bold. All cloaked and masked in sunnen gold.

ability.name: Martyr-in-Waiting
ability.description: Use as a reaction to being Mortally Wounded. Allies fighting with you regain d6GD and get +d12 against your attacker for the combat.

passion.name: Pride
passion.description: Restore SPI when you take personal credit for a great victory.

flavor1.name: Where did the armour show itself?

items.name: Gold-masked helm
items.description: Opponents who know the value of gold have their first ever attack against you Impaired

description: Within a blink they were atop their steed. Knight and beast at one, a red streak in the green.

ability.name: Song of the Steed
ability.description: Speak in a voice comprehensible to horses. They need reasoning with rather than commanding.

passion.name: Certainty
passion.description: Restore SPI when you prove somebody wrong.

items.name: Rider's plate
items.description: A1 when mounted

items.name: Fine saddle and tack
items.description: You can never be dismounted

items.name: Rider's axe
items.description: +d6 when mounted, can be thrown

items.name: Rider's axe
items.description: +d6 when mounted, can be thrown

items.name: Rider's axe
items.description: +d6 when mounted, can be thrown

description: The right words say everything and nothing. A different truth to each ear.

ability.name: Twisted Words
ability.description: Speak, but choose two different meanings, as different as you wish, even total opposites. Choose which meaning each listener takes from the words.

passion.name: Integrity
passion.description: Restore SPI when you discredit somebody unworthy of their position.

items.name: Moon pendant
items.description: Grants the wearer a false form under moonlight, roling each night

description: The claw is nothing without the eye. The eye is nothing without the wing.

ability.name: Flockbond
ability.description: See through the eyes of your bird, and learn the local knowledge of any prey it eats.

passion.name: Regret
passion.description: Restore SPI when you burn a part of your past.

items.name: Hookhammer
items.description: +d8 dropping from above

description: Cruelty can bring a peace. Stone and spikes split into bloom.

ability.name: The Red Hunt
ability.description: Once each day, infuse a target’s spilt blood into an arrow to give it +d12 against the target. You can also taste a small amount of the blood to get a glimpse of their location.

passion.name: Apathy
passion.description: Restore SPI when you reject a call for comfort.

items.name: Jagged Spear
items.description: +d8 against a target you have Wounded or Scarred

description: More than foxes leave trails in their stead. Comings and goings laid plain as a thread

ability.name: Strands of Past
ability.description: By studying the ground for a whole Phase you can ask a single yes or no question about what happened here in the past few days.

passion.name: Fear
passion.description: Restore SPI when refusing to go into the dark.

items.name: Sanguine lens
items.description: Traces of blood appear obvious when viewed through this

description: Their wait has been longer than we could imagine. Their blade slow but unstoppable

ability.name: Patient Strike
ability.description: Make a melee Attack when you have not moved this turn. +d10 to the Attack. Ignore the target’s Armour and immunities of any sort. If this fails to defeat the opponent, take d6 Damage yourself.

passion.name: Avarice
passion.description: Restore SPI when you gain significant wealth.

items.name: Amber amulet
items.description: If placed in a fire, carries its warmth for a whole day

description: In fury’s reign afore the rav’ning throng. In chaos born as knight where beast belong

ability.name: Pack Tactics
ability.description: Use before attacking with at least one ally. You may combine any number of dice into larger dice with a value equal to the total of the combined dice, to a maximum of d12 Damage. For example, combining a d4 and a d8 into a d12.

passion.name: Prestige
passion.description: Restore SPI when you take credit for the deeds of another.

items.name: Rations from home
items.description: See below

description: A verdant cloak on sable steed. Neath nature’s veil, yond sight and heed

ability.name: Fade to Green
ability.description: Use when hiding still and silent in greenery. You cannot be found by any means. While hiding you can only perform a specific type of action without revealing yourself, but also benefit from a heightened sense (see below).

passion.name: Elegance
passion.description: Restore SPI when you leave a place more beautiful than you found it.

items.name: Branchspear
items.description: When stabbed into a tree it is immovable by anyone but you

items.name: Cloaked mail
items.description: A1 in verdant environments only

description: Born below the soil, below the stone, below all thought. Down, down, further down, of blood and iron wrought

ability.name: Will of the Irons
ability.description: Move a single chain that you touch as if it was a limb. You can lash out with both ends (d6 each), grasp opponents, and otherwise move it to your will.

passion.name: Abyss
passion.description: Restore SPI when sleeping underground in complete darkness

items.name: Oubliette mail
items.description: Wrapped in a Long iron chain

description: Beware of those festooning the flag. Their blade may be idle but their comrades are sharpened

ability.name: Rousing Presence
ability.description: Use once per Attack when you are part of a group Attack. You may reroll the entire pool of Attack dice once only.

passion.name: Sensitivity
passion.description: Restore SPI when receiving social approval.

items.name: Banner-pike
items.description: See below, lose d6 SPI if the banner ever falls to the ground in battle

description: The humble know no home in place. For such wanderers, the horizon is their hearth

ability.name: Wayfinder Sense
ability.description: Sense the direction in which a particular goal lies, but not the best route to travel there. You cannot use this to find your lost home or the City.

passion.name: Inquisition
passion.description: Restore SPI when you wrangle the truth out of an uncooperative person.

items.name: Bitterglaive
items.description: +d8 vs targets within their home

items.name: Patchwork mail with hooded cloak
items.description: Can be used to vanish into a significantly large crowd

description: In wood, hide, or iron, as armour meek or grand. No greater shield for the weak than the oath-sworn Knight’s own hand

ability.name: Death Ward
ability.description: Use when a nearby ally would take a Mortal Wound or be killed outright. You take a Mortal Wound instead.

passion.name: Mortality
passion.description: Restore SPI when you see an ally suffer a Mortal Wound.

items.name: Soothing salve
items.description: You prepare enough for one use each day, restores VIG, see below

description: Some draw screams from wrent flesh and bone. Others have ways to make very soul moan

ability.name: Pain Strike
ability.description: Make a melee Attack on your own. Damage is applied to GD as normal, but then to SPI in place of VIG. If the target loses half of their SPI from this Attack they lie broken before you.

passion.name: Reverence
passion.description: Restore SPI when offering respectful homage to the dead.

data.text: Speak remotely with any one person

items.name: Strange herbs
items.description: Different effect each time, see below. Enough for one dose each day. Effects wear off after an hour, but Virtue Loss remains

description: A Knight’s sworn oath outlasts the stone wall. Yet Seers say in time even words must fall

ability.name: Knight to mark it with your seal.
ability.description: They can use Deny as if they were a Knight, but then the seal is removed.

passion.name: Modesty
passion.description: Restore SPI when refusing a reward

steed.name: Dusty steed  ABILITY - Seal of Binding Strike a shield or armour being to a non

items.name: Siege plate
items.description: When the wearer braces against a door it cannot be breached

items.name: 3 runic scrolls
items.description: See below, can only be read by Seers, who value them greatly

description: Horn cried, hearts asank, blood awoke. In its wail our fates all sealed as the feast for death

ability.name: Carnage Fanfare
ability.description: Blow the wild horn in battle. For the rest of this battle any VIG lost through Damage is doubled. This affects all involved in the battle, whether they hear the horn or not.

passion.name: Bluntness
passion.description: Restore SPI when you move the conversation in a way that somebody is avoiding.

items.name: Antler-halberd
items.description: +d10 vs horned or antlered opponents

items.name: Wild horn
items.description: See below

description: In serenous moon the best of us can rest in docile light. That quietest bird in impure times must soar in bloody flight

ability.name: Strike of Serenity
ability.description: Make a melee Attack against a wounded target. Get +d8 to the Attack. If this defeats the target then all allies restore SPI.

passion.name: Vengeance
passion.description: Restore SPI when achieving a worthy revenge

data.text: Knights who strike the first blow against you lose d6 SPI
Horses other than your own are afraid of you
Lose d6 SPI if you ever strike the first blow to a Knight

items.name: Winged scale
items.description: Can’t fly, but see below

items.name: Bright weeds
items.description: Create a cool glow when crushed to a powder

description: At last, I’m here!. The one you were waiting for, the one behind the words

ability.name: Weaver of Fate
ability.description: Just before night falls, tell a story related to a nearby place, noting two details past, present, or future. The Referee secretly chooses one of them to become truth. This can only be performed once per location.

passion.name: Showmanship
passion.description: Restore SPI when you deliberately draw unwanted attention.

items.name: Book of stories
items.description: Something for everyone, see below for a random tale

description: I stand inclad in shelldy stead. Nawone of you will see me dead!

ability.name: Unbreakable Shell
ability.description: Use at the start of your turn. You cannot move, but double the Armour score of your shield and gain +d6 when attacking with a shield.

passion.name: Wellrestedness
passion.description: Restore SPI when you sleep for two consecutive Phases.

items.name: Drinking horn
items.description: Makes even disgusting liquids taste good, see below

description: Sure as sky and sea. For every lock a key

ability.name: Retroactive Forethought
ability.description: Once per day, produce a common item from your backpack that you could have reasonably acquired at a recent point.

passion.name: Distraction
passion.description: Restore SPI when you abandon a set plan.

items.name: Ring of keys
items.description: For any lock there’s a 1-in-3 chance you can find a key that fits

items.name: Bag of ill-gotten gains
items.description: See below

description: There they stood, awashed in soddled loam. A grottling dance, the dusky sky agloam

ability.name: Wading Stance
ability.description: Gain 1 Armour and +d6 to all attacks when fighting in at least waist-high water.

passion.name: Filth
passion.description: Restore SPI when you become utterly filthy.

data.text: Always knows which way is north

items.name: Barbed mail
items.description: Anyone trying to grab or hold you takes d6 Damage

items.name: Moat shovel
items.description: Any hole dug with this immediately begins to fill with water, stopping when full

description: A fated charge in mail and stalward plate. Abaited foes await that thundring gait

ability.name: Unstoppable Dash
ability.description: When you are in motion you cannot be stopped, but sustain d12 Damage if breaking through a solid wall or object. You cannot sustain this motion for long distances.

passion.name: Strength
passion.description: Restore SPI when you complete a physical task that somebody else was struggling with.

items.name: Fancy plate
items.description: See below

items.name: Hand-written book
items.description: “Of Time-Tested Guidance in the Construction and Destruction of Fortresses, Ramparts, and Castles”

description: Abrash and bold, renowned and rued. Their presence cheered on one breath, damned anext

ability.name: Humble Glamourie
ability.description: After eating and drinking with somebody for a few hours they consider you trustworthy enough to speak openly about anything you ask about. The next day they come to their senses and realise if they revealed too much.

passion.name: Revelry
passion.description: Restore SPI when socially overindulging.

data.text: Ruler of the Seat of Power
Neglect in a time of great need

items.name: Scar from a friend betrayed
items.description: See below

description: A fat one indeed who feasts on the fruits of fact. The nut of knowing nourishes from nog to nosh

ability.name: Arboreal Archive
ability.description: Spend a Phase running hands over a tree to access its memory, seeing anything that happened under its shade or over its roots.

passion.name: Alertness
passion.description: Restore SPI when you spot an ambush, trap, or surprise attack.

items.name: Sack of books
items.description: 1-in-2 chance you have a small snippet of information on any particular topic at hand, otherwise you find a miscellaneous tome, as below

description: As deeds abound in history's script. More slip from time’s forgetful grip

ability.name: Unnoticed Deed
ability.description: Once per day you can retroactively declare an action that you took earlier that day, such as giving instructions to an ally, or gathering a specific piece of information. This cannot be used to acquire new items.

passion.name: Anonymity
passion.description: Restore SPI when somebody believes in a false identity you are portraying.

items.name: Cloak and hood
items.description: See below, while fully cloaked and hooded, people will see you in the moment, but have no memory of you once you pass from sight

description: Steed agasp, spear agroan, strike agore. Sharp afrail, sight ablind, then no more

ability.name: Shattering Charge
ability.description: Once per day, make a solo mounted charging Attack with a lance. The Attack gains +d12, Blast, and Gambits caused by the Attack count as strong. The lance is shattered.

passion.name: Adventure
passion.description: Restore SPI when you enter a Myth Hex.

items.name: Lance
items.description: Hefty if mounted

items.name: Mystic sight
items.description: You can see something you shouldn't be able to, see below

description: Dream of the commoner, tragedy of the knight. To die at rest, at peace, at quiet

ability.name: Pledge Quest
ability.description: Swear a quest to somebody who cares. Until you complete the quest you cannot regain lost GD, but get +d12 on all attacks against those who stand in your way. Lose d12 SPI if you abandon the quest.

passion.name: Impetuosity
passion.description: Restore SPI when you are first to fight.

items.name: Ancient sword
items.description: See below

items.name: Cold stone
items.description: Can absorb a single ailment from the wielder before vanishing in a burning light

description: With ring a’lone, head dreams of home. With rings o’two, heart fills with rue

ability.name: Unbreakable Circle
ability.description: Draw a circle in the ground, with yourself in the centre. Until you leave the circle, no other living being can enter or leave it.

passion.name: Respectfulness
passion.description: Restore SPI when returning something to its rightful owner after it was lost or taken.

items.name: Pair of rings
items.description: See below, can only be put on or removed at sunrise

description: Gravid beats on ferrous slab, thick air a crimson sheen. Each mallenstroke leaves scars aworn, apparent and unseen

ability.name: Tempering Strike
ability.description: When you cause a Wound with a melee weapon, that weapon receives +d6 until the end of combat. This effect can stack.

passion.name: Burning
passion.description: Restore SPI when you are wounded by fire.

items.name: Bolt-guisarme
items.description: Long in melee or slow in ranged

items.name: Scars from the forge
items.description: See below

items.name: Pots of forge dust
items.description: Spreads irritating gas in the area when broken, Impairing attacks from within. You can make more anywhere with a forge

description: Under gleam of lumenlight, in skin or stone ascratch. Strands of faten path unveiled, a starry scrawl to match

ability.name: Destinous Sigil
ability.description: At sunset, etch a cosmic rune somewhere secret on your person. Choose a number. When a die rolls that number you may adjust it to any other value on that die. This can be performed a number of times equal to the chosen number. A different number is chosen next sunset.

passion.name: Foresight
passion.description: Restore SPI when your prediction is proven to be correct.

items.name: Sealed crystal flask
items.description: See below, roll once only, and you know the effect

description: In dregs of dawn the damnlings sway. For famine’s brood a gifted prey

ability.name: Carrion’s Call
ability.description: Speak with scavenger creatures, and summon them to you. They’re only helpful if you’re providing them with food.

passion.name: Misery
passion.description: Restore SPI when you meet somebody new and complain to them about something.

items.name: Neck-catcher
items.description: Wounded targets are snared securely around the neck, provided they have one

items.name: Salvaged armour
items.description: See below

items.name: Titan beads
items.description: 3 polished stones. When thrown they transform into a huge boulder mid-air, striking for d10 blast

description: A loom of wisdom spun at dawn. Laid to rest til coming morn

ability.name: Dawn Contemplation
ability.description: At sunrise each day, choose any area of knowledge. You can ask the Referee three questions within this area, which they answer honestly with yes, no, or maybe if uncertain.

passion.name: Introversion
passion.description: Restore SPI when you refuse a formal social gathering, or leave early.

items.name: Perfect recall
items.description: You remember everything you have ever experienced perfectly, with a few limitations, see below

description: A star of truth, fell from ahigh. Such lumous ones should wear no lie

ability.name: Star Fall
ability.description: You never suffer Damage from falling, unless landing on something harmful. When you land from a fall of at least 12ft you may release a shockwave (d8 blast).

passion.name: Authenticity
passion.description: Restore SPI when you reveal your identity or intentions at an inconvenient moment.

data.text: Can be recalled to your hand when in sight

items.name: Elaborate trident
items.description: See below

items.name: Moon oil
items.description: When rubbed on an object you could lift it renders the object weightless until washed with water

description: The blood sees through time aflow. To certain souls, a glimpse they show

ability.name: Glimpse of Fate
ability.description: Once per day you can undo a single action performed by you or your Company, declaring it was in fact a minor vision you received. Play as if it never happened.

passion.name: Respect
passion.description: Restore SPI when you yield to a Seer.

items.name: Toothed blade
items.description: D8 , +d8 against Seers

items.name: Tapestry cloak
items.description: See below

items.name: Flickerlamp
items.description: A warm lantern that casts its shadows toward the nearest Seer

description: A humble beast, no roar or flight. Beneath the grey a show of might

ability.name: Lowly Shroud
ability.description: At any time you may choose to have somebody observing you be utterly convinced that you are just a humble, unarmed peasant, and your steed a mule.

passion.name: Kindness
passion.description: Restore SPI when you stop an act of cruelty.

items.name: Weighted staff
items.description: Long

items.name: 3 explosives
items.description: d8 blast, see below

description: A trail of hope across the land. In sorrow’s face, bright reprimand

ability.name: Luminous Eruption
ability.description: Use once per Phase. A light source you are holding briefly illuminates the entire Hex and causes d12 Damage to nearby beings who live in darkness.

passion.name: Valour
passion.description: Restore SPI when you engage in combat against the odds.

steed.name: Wild steed
steed.biography: Will not be ridden by any but you

items.name: Mistvial
items.description: When broken, thick mist rolls in over the whole Hex for the rest of the Phase. See below for repair requirements

description: As sword abend, as plate afold,. As shield asplint, a tale atold.

ability.name: Heightened Sharpness
ability.description: When you perform a Strong Gambit with a bladed weapon you may choose one of the following as the effect, the target receiving a Save as normal: • Take a limb • Take a head if their GD is 0

passion.name: Diligence
passion.description: Restore SPI when refusing a shortcut.

items.name: Cleavingblade
items.description: See below

items.name: Inscribed scabbard
items.description: Shows a different scene each morning, hinting at the nearest Myth

description: In eyes ajust, the given got. Blow for blow, from one shared l

ability.name: Reflection of Blood
ability.description: When you are Wounded, the attacker suffers the same amount of VIG loss as you. When you are Scarred the attacker gets the same Scar.

passion.name: Egality
passion.description: Restore SPI when you give somebody else their fair share.

steed.name: Faded steed
steed.biography: You have memories together; see below

items.name: Hushingbell
items.description: Those who hear the bell hear nothing else

description: Each touch of iron takes a price, in breath or blood or bone. A nasty cut takes something worse, the warmth of distant home

ability.name: Sunder Memory
ability.description: When you Wound a target you can rob them of a single specific memory. If it is a Mortal Wound then you can remove all memory of a specific place, thing, person, or event.

passion.name: Temperance
passion.description: Restore SPI when you refuse a luxury.

data.text: Twin Knights are lost in the woods
The Lion and the Lizard are bitter rivals
A mother hates her six ugly sons
A hermit lambasts the stars for his sad life
A clever chicken outwits a farmer
A poet wastes her life fleeing from death
They’re eaten by a pack of wolves
They all die of a disgusting plague
It turns into a call to find the City
It ends on a literal cliffhanger
They all lived happily ever after

items.name: Pouch of wolfnuts
items.description: Repellent to canines

items.name: Poem on tattered parchment
items.description: See below

description: In arg or aur, decisions spun. A prize, a life, lost or won

ability.name: Thrown to Chance
ability.description: Use instead of attacking normally. Flip a coin. Heads the target is killed, tails you are killed. This is final.

passion.name: Generosity
passion.description: Restore SPI when you give generously to somebody in need.

steed.name: Arctic steed
steed.biography: Long coat turns white in winter

items.name: Jaunty flute
items.description: Can only play a certain type of music, see below

description: Sycamore, leather, felt and strings. In heartless chest a soul still sings

ability.name: Impression of Life
ability.description: You do not need to breathe, eat, drink, sleep, or love, but still feel the drives.

passion.name: Imitation
passion.description: Restore SPI when you pass for human while under scrutiny.

items.name: Unnatural body concealed beneath plate suit, hood, and clothes
items.description: See below

description: You call for the truth from me?. I will not offer you that which cannot be found

ability.name: Thousand Faces
ability.description: You can assume the face of anybody you have touched, but your body and voice are unchanged.

passion.name: Vigilance
passion.description: Restore SPI when you prevent a betrayal.

items.name: Masked helm
items.description: See below

items.name: Star ink and parchment
items.description: Writing only shows under starlight at night

description: Ribble rabble, ronky donk, they bounce a duckle dine. Clatter clink, clanky tank, a rib, a skull, a spine

ability.name: Bone Magnate
ability.description: When you make a genuine trade, a bone for a bone, learn something about the individual that the acquired bone came from, or something that they knew in life.

passion.name: Acumen
passion.description: Restore SPI when you come out better from a bargain.

steed.name: Marsh steed
steed.biography: Moves effortlessly on bog and marsh

items.name: Needledagger
items.description: D6, +d6 against armoured targets

items.name: Box of bones
items.description: See below

description: Saline stink adwells in every depth. No matter how calm the surface

ability.name: Inspire Ire
ability.description: Activate at the end of your turn. Until the next turn, any enemies that Attack targets other than you lose d10 SPI after the Attack.

passion.name: Mettle
passion.description: Restore SPI when accepting a non-combat challenge with the odds set against you.

items.name: Everflask
items.description: Contains an endless supply of fresh water as  as its thirst is sated with each use, see below

description: A glow unseen, from neath a dream. Illuminates the fabric’s seam

ability.name: Light Beyond Light
ability.description: You can cause any metal object you hold to emit a bright light that only you can see. Bees, butterflies, and hedgehogs can also see the light.

passion.name: Positivity
passion.description: Restore SPI when you raise somebody’s mood.

data.text: Other steeds show fealty to it

items.name: Flattering handmirror
items.description: Shows the viewer’s ideal vision of themselves

description: Countless stars dotted in the night. To the eyes of one, each a stain of failure amid purest black

ability.name: Celestial Retreat
ability.description: While you can see the sky you can instantly vanish to a distant sanctuary, leaving a small glowing stone behind. You can rematerialise at the stone at any time.

passion.name: Constellations
passion.description: Restore SPI when you get tell somebody new about the stars as you point to them.

data.text: Can also be used in melee combat

steed.name: Boneless steed
steed.biography: Can squeeze through any gap as large as its head

items.name: Strange crossbow
items.description: See below

items.name: Echostone
items.description: Can record and repeat one spoken phrase

description: No blood or cry. Not here, not today

ability.name: Site of Respite
ability.description: You may declare a building that you occupy as peaceful ground. Nobody within the building can bring themselves to attack until you leave.

passion.name: Quietude
passion.description: Restore SPI when bringing peaceful order to a chaotic place.

items.name: Mummified snake
items.description: Reptiles will not attack anyone holding it, it speaks to your mind directly, see below

description: A whimsied whirl, a crafty guise. The truth revealed as sour surprise

ability.name: Cunning Ploy
ability.description: Once per day, declare your current self to be an illusion, dispersing into smoke. The real you is watching from a safe place nearby.

passion.name: Wits
passion.description: Restore SPI when you avoid being tricked or outwitted.

steed.name: Tunnel steed
steed.biography: Can see perfectly in the dark

items.name: Hidden blade
items.description: See below

items.name: Sealing wax
items.description: Can render any container watertight and airtight

description: Tattered wing, loath’ed cry, ugly bill. And yet what heights

ability.name: Guiding Gust
ability.description: Ascend to the top of a vertical surface you are touching, lifted on a burst of wind.

passion.name: Joy
passion.description: Restore SPI when you deliver good news.

items.name: Patchwork mail
items.description: See below

items.name: Blinding bracelet
items.description: Anybody wearing the bracelet is blind until they take it off

description: Keen eyes see what cold heart seeks. No empty handed fool, this bird

ability.name: Scourer’s Sense
ability.description: If you are searching for something specific you always know for sure whether it is in your immediate surroundings or not.

passion.name: Heraldry
passion.description: Restore SPI when you announce the owner of a banner, crest, or coat of arms, which you can always recognise.

items.name: Twofold pouch containing a memento
items.description: Items you place in the pouch can only be retrieved by you, see below

description: Final rest, earned in life. The echos linger on

ability.name: Spirit Call
ability.description: Once per day, release the invisible spirit from your reliquary. It will follow a single, specific command. It acts with the general capacities of a normal human but can be invisible and immaterial as needed.

passion.name: Tradition
passion.description: Restore SPI when you ensure a tradition is thoroughly honoured.

items.name: Sack of history tomes, treasured reliquary
items.description: See below

description: Gutly ribbons, blood’s sweet dance. The future calls in gory trance

ability.name: Carrion Casting
ability.description: Spread the innards of the recently dead across the ground. Ask a single question, they point you in a direction that would help.

passion.name: Thrift
passion.description: Restore SPI when you make good use of something you found discarded.

items.name: Black axe
items.description: D10 , +d10 vs wounded targets

items.name: Sinister mail
items.description: See below

items.name: Spidernip nuts
items.description: Acts as a pleasing stimulant for insects and arachnids when ground to a powder

description: No body, no mind, should live acaged. Yet freedom rarely comes with a whispe

ability.name: Bond Breaker
ability.description: Strike a chain or lock with a metal weapon. Both shatter loudly.

passion.name: Liberty
passion.description: Restore SPI when you release somebody from an unwanted bond.

data.text: Allows you to fall safely from any height

steed.name: Grassy steed
steed.biography: Blends into long grass when sitting

items.name: Hexshield
items.description: See below

items.name: Tempest chest
items.description: When empty, it can draw a storm within, restoring calm weather. If opened when full the storm is released

description: Judge not a knight on might and favour. Where silk endures, a heart can waver

ability.name: Adamant Gossamer
ability.description: You can draw thin strands of silky string of any length from your mouth. They are utterly unbreakable, but burn to ash in an instant.

passion.name: Mercy
passion.description: Restore SPI when you accept a surrender or plea for forgiveness.

items.name: Woven coat armour
items.description: No protection against fire

items.name: Intricate brass puzzle
items.description: Compelling but impossible

description: The ignorant deem beastly realms as mere anarchy. In truth, the structure runs much deeper than our own

ability.name: Bestial Renown
ability.description: Each time you defeat an animal in a contest befitting its strengths, all animals of that type will react favourably to you.

passion.name: Closure
passion.description: Restore SPI when you get an answer that you’ve been seeking for some time.

data.text: It happened before you bought them

items.name: Fang blades
items.description: d8 each when wielded as a pair

items.name: 3 phoenix feathers
items.description: Erupts in flame when dropped on the ground, d8 blast

description: No greater gift than bough and bush. What more could we ask from this bountiful land?

ability.name: Nature’s Vault
ability.description: You can wield branches as javelins (d6) or greatspears (d10 long) and eat leaves as a satisfying meal.

passion.name: Gourmet
passion.description: Restore SPI when you eat a new type of fruit or vegetable.

data.text: Instantly cools any liquid it touches
It transforms into 20ft of rope when shaken
Seers believe it is a blessing upon you
It’s long and inconvenient to carry
It looks just like every other stick
It only works in bright sunlight

items.name: Verdant leather
items.description: While within foliage

items.name: Useful stick
items.description: See below

items.name: Murmur box
items.description: Creates the illusion of indistinct conversation when open

description: Revealer of all secrets, in stark, judgemental light. In cold and sharpened heart lies no deceitful curse

ability.name: Touch of Glass
ability.description: You can see through any surface that you place your hand upon.

passion.name: Curiosity
passion.description: Restore SPI when looking somewhere you really shouldn’t.

steed.name: Chestnut steed
steed.biography: Hated by spiders and hates them back

items.name: Painted mail
items.description: See below

items.name: Witching needle
items.description: A six-inch spike, can be stuck into any material, and cannot be removed by anybody but you or a Seer

description: A bed of gluous, parchly cloth, a coat of stickly sleen. Emerged in morning good as new, chirurgery unseen

ability.name: Chrysaline Rebirth
ability.description: At night you may immerse yourself in a cocoon through means you do not fully understand (see below). After a full day you emerge, your VIG restored, and any physical harm cured. This cannot cure death unless the process requires it.

passion.name: Community
passion.description: Restore SPI when you leave a community better off than when you arrived.

items.name: Tidal resin
items.description: When burned, all nearby water becomes still and solid for a while

description: Arise! Arise!. But, for what? For whom?

ability.name: Rebuked by Death
ability.description: Use when you are dead. Return to life. Your body is as you left it, as are your Guard and Virtue scores.

passion.name: Acceptance
passion.description: Restore SPI when warmly welcomed into somebody’s home.

items.name: Cleaner salt ,
items.description: Renders even the most rotten food safe and delicious

items.name: Wooden animal miniature
items.description: See below

description: This and that, might just be that and this. As today were tomorrow, soon yesterday, no truth lies set in stone

ability.name: Warp & Weft
ability.description: Swap the positions of an object you are holding and another object you can see. They must be of a similar size and shape, such as two swords.

passion.name: Detachment
passion.description: Restore SPI when you discard something that you want.

items.name: Thrown weapon
items.description: See below

items.name: Hushcloth
items.description: Items fully wrapped in this cloth create no noise

description: Thunder!. Should be felt, not heard, else call it a whimper!

ability.name: Voice of the Skies
ability.description: While outdoors, you can shout loud enough to be heard clearly throughout the whole Hex and all adjacent Hexes.

passion.name: Discord
passion.description: Restore SPI when you disrupt a place of order.

data.text: Can fetch items up to the weight of a coin

description: Lust and loathing, desire and ire. The two great forces, perhaps just one

ability.name: Aqueous Repulsion
ability.description: You can forcefully repel liquids with an outstretched hand, enough to hold a river at bay for a while.

passion.name: Entitlement
passion.description: Restore SPI when you get something that you were promised but initially denied.

data.text: CLA Save or go blind for a moment
SPI Save or weep with intense sorrow

items.name: Beckoning net
items.description: Fish wilfully swim into this fishing net

items.name: Preserved fish
items.description: See below

description: I can show you why I cannot bare the false smile. Now bare your skin and harden your heart

ability.name: Sink Teeth
ability.description: You can bite (d6) someone, choosing one of the following effects before the bite, occurring only if you Wound them: Regain VIG equal to the VIG that they lose, lower them into normal sleep, show them one of your memories

passion.name: Melancholy
passion.description: Restore SPI when you dampen the mood.

items.name: Ancient scroll
items.description: Has references to places in this Realm, but outdated, see below

description: Why lurk shellbound in abyssal depths, solitary for life?. All the best secrets come from the mouths and eyes of others

ability.name: Gift from the Deep
ability.description: Produce one pearl each morning, unless you haven’t given or traded your previous pearl. You can see through the eyes of anybody that is carrying one of your pearls.

passion.name: Gossip
passion.description: Restore SPI when you share or receive gossip.

flavor.name: A blade taken from the sea

data.text: River water tastes salty to you

items.name: Cleaving blade
items.description: See below

items.name: Salincense
items.description: Smoke from this candle causes plants to wither and die in seconds

description: In squeakling hole I squashed and curled. Amidst my kin, a kinder world

ability.name: Verminform
ability.description: Take the form of a rat to squeeze into any space that a rat could fit into. You return to your normal form as soon as you are in a space that allows it. You can also speak with rats, who are generally helpful.

passion.name: Trust
passion.description: Restore SPI when giving the benefit of the doubt in a way that leaves you vulnerable.

items.name: Modified gambeson
items.description: See below

items.name: Listening horn
items.description: When placed against a wall, hear everything from the other side in perfect clarity
